code: import{useRef,useEffect}from'react';var useInterval=function useInterval(callback,delay){var savedCallback=useRef();useEffect(function(){savedCallback.current=callback;},[callback]);useEffect(function(){var time=function time(){savedCallback.current();};if(delay!==null){var id=setInterval(time,delay);return function(){return clearInterval(id);};}},[delay]);};export default useInterval;
